module.name: magiczoom
module.description: Zoom into images when you hover over an image. A beautiful effect.&nbsp;<a target='_blank' title='Watch tutorial' style='color: #268CCD; text-decoration: underline; font-weight: bold;' href='http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yAix6lXqyAw'>Watch tutorial</a>.
module.author: Magic Toolbox
module.confirmUninstall: All magiczoom settings would be deleted. Do you really want to uninstall this module ?
